entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening and then to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
